Description: Implement Simulink model of DC gearmotor with resonant load using nominal parameter
Model potentiometer and ADC circuit for beam displacement measurement
Design PID controller for hub position with ts≤0.85s, Mp≤30%, and anti-windup
Validate PID in simulation with step inputs (50°, 120°) and anti-windup
Design state-space controller for hub position using eigenvalue placement
Validate state-space controller in simulation (50° step)
(Optional) Modify design for robust tracking with integral action
(Optional) Validate integral action in simulation (50° step)
Design LQR using Symmetric Root Locus for nominal tracking
Validate LQR (SRL) in simulation (50° step)
Design LQR using Bryson’s rule with Q and r weights
Validate LQR (Bryson) in simulation (50° step)
(Optional) Design LQR with integral action using SRL
(Optional) Validate LQR with integral action (50° step)
(Optional) Design LQR with integral action using Bryson’s rule
(Optional) Validate LQR with integral action (50° step)
(Optional) Design FS-LQR to attenuate resonant mode
(Optional) Validate FS-LQR with q22∈{0.01,1,100} (50° step)
(Optional) Extend FS-LQR with integral action
(Optional) Validate FS-LQR with integral action (50° step)
Configure experimental setup for beam deflection measurement
Implement bias removal scheme for beam displacement sensor
Estimate ωn and δ of elastic joint, compute Bb and k
Redesign PID controller with estimated joint parameters
Validate redesigned PID on experimental setup
Redesign state-space controller with estimated parameters
Validate redesigned state-space controller experimentally
(Optional) Redesign state-space with integral action
(Optional) Validate state-space with integral action
Redesign LQR (SRL) with estimated parameters
Validate LQR (SRL) experimentally
Redesign LQR (Bryson) with estimated parameters
Validate LQR (Bryson) experimentally
(Optional) Redesign LQR with integral action
(Optional) Validate LQR with integral action
(Optional) Redesign FS-LQR with estimated parameters
